title: News24.com | WATCH | Coronavirus: Army dismisses shutdown rumours as soldiers line Joburg streets
description: SANDF dismissed rumours of a deployment for a looming shutdown, and called for calm.
content:
The South African National Defence Force (SANDF) arrived in Craighall, Johannesburg, sending the public into a frenzy about whether it signals a possible shutdown. 
Passers-by have noticed a large gathering of SANDF officials in full uniform outside their co… [+1366 chars]
